MS2 receives<div>"Updated policy"</div><div>message</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-15"> <mxGeometry x="0.0296" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-1" value="Kafka" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="280" width="120" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-5" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-2" target="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-11" value="5. Send<div>"Updated policy"</div><div>message</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-5"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1176" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-2" value="MS1<div>(producer)</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="300" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-3" value="MS2<div>(consumer)</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="22" y="385" width="120" height="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-7" target="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-9" value="3. Press Enter<div>(simultes an API call)</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-8"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1778" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-7" value="You" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-190" y="300" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-10" value="The API call triggers a change in Casbin policy.<div><br></div><div>This then calls the Casbin watcher to produce a message and send it to Kafka</div>" style="shape=callout;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;perimeter=calloutPerimeter;position2=0.28;align=left;spacingLeft=4;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="190" width="250" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-14" value="Policy DB" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.database;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="530" width="60" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-17" value="In the code, we just use a file for simplicty" style="shape=callout;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;perimeter=calloutPerimeter;position2=1;align=left;spacingLeft=4;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;verticalAlign=top;direction=west;base=40;size=30;position=0.64;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="580" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-18" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-3" target="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="90" y="560" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-21" value="7. Reload Casbin policy" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-18"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0645" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="55" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-23" value="2. Load Casbin policy" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-18"> <mxGeometry x="-0.729" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="20" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-19" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-2" target="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-20" y="350" /> <mxPoint x="-20" y="610" /> <mxPoint x="310" y="610" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-20" value="4. Update Casbin policy" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-19"> <mxGeometry x="0.3169" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-22" value="1. Load Casbin policy" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="aYQl8HzydwQqDX4HLidZ-19"> <mxGeometry x="-0.5077" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
The API call triggers a change in Casbin policy.
This then calls the Casbin watcher to produce a message and send it to Kafka

switch.text: The API call triggers a change in Casbin...
